p: Of the 33 cases included in this investigation, 27 (81%) were male and 6 (19%) were female. The average and median age of infected infants at the time of sampling for HPeV was 81 and 55 days old respectively. The average and median ages of infants infected with HPeV1 were 197 and 138 days respectively, while the average and median ages for infants infected with HPeV3 were only 59 and 50 days respectively. The average and median ages of the HPeV3 infected infants were significantly lower than the HPeV1 cases (p = 0.017, Mann-Whitney U Test).
